Metadata.title: Qcargan | Logistics intelligence
Metadata.description: Track and price shipments with localized insights.

Navbar.sedanDesc: Comfortable, elegant and built for long-distance travel with a dedicated trunk.
Navbar.suvDesc: Spacious and versatile, perfect for families or weekend adventures.
Navbar.cityDesc: Agile and easy to park, ideal for dense urban living.
Navbar.pickupsDesc: Ready for work or cargo with flexible interior layouts.
Navbar.usedMarketplaceDesc: We are building a dedicated space to list, price and sell pre-loved EVs with verified buyers. Join the early access list and get notified when the marketplace launches.
Navbar.listVehicleDesc: Guided listing workflow with all EV-specific fields.
Navbar.transparentPricingDesc: Market insights help you set the right price.
Navbar.scheduleViewingsDesc: Coordinate visits with verified buyers in one place.
Navbar.financingDesc: Flexible financing options for every electric vehicle budget.
Navbar.electriciansDesc: Installation, maintenance and repair of home charging stations.
Navbar.workshopsDesc: Professional repairs and maintenance tailored for EVs.
Navbar.detailingDesc: Protective coatings and deep cleaning sessions for your vehicle.
Navbar.insuranceDesc: Quotes from insurers specialized in electric vehicles.
Navbar.financingServiceDesc: Compare interest rates and pick the plan that fits your journey.
Navbar.electriciansServiceDesc: Find certified EV electricians near you for safe charger installs.
Navbar.mechanicsServiceDesc: Diagnostics and maintenance from trusted EV technicians.
Navbar.detailingServiceDesc: Keep your car showroom fresh with curated detailing packages.
Navbar.insuranceServiceDesc: Protect your investment with coverage built for EV ownership.
Navbar.portableChargersDesc: Charge wherever you go with compact EV chargers.
Navbar.wallChargersDesc: Reliable home or office charging installations.
Navbar.accessoriesDesc: Upgrade your ride with curated accessories.
Navbar.portableChargersShopDesc: Bring backup power anywhere with compact chargers.
Navbar.wallChargersShopDesc: Fixed chargers with fast, safe energy delivery.
Navbar.accessoriesShopDesc: Personalize the experience with organizers and more.

Home.heroDescription: Qcargan centralizes your carrier rates, quote approvals, and billing in a single bilingual workspace.
Home.sectionInsightsDescription: Each workspace inherits the same glassmorphic surfaces, teal accents, and bilingual flows defined in our system styles.
Home.ctaBannerDescription: Launch a bilingual workspace with glassmorphic cards, electric dark mode, and localized rates in minutes.

visibility.title: Real-time visibility
visibility.description: Blend vessel tracking, customs paperwork, and billing milestones into one lane timeline.

automation.title: Adaptive automation
automation.description: Trigger milestone alerts, duty prepayments, and reconciliations with rules that match your playbook.

insights.title: Insights for every team
insights.description: Finance, operations, and sales see the same numbers with localized currency and language.

Pricing.title: Transparent pricing for growing teams
Pricing.description: Choose a plan that reflects your lane volume today and scale as your network expands.

signup.title: Sign up
signup.displayNameHelp: This will appear on your profile

signUpSuccess.title: Welcome to Qcargan
signUpSuccess.subtitle: Confirm your email to activate your workspace.
signUpSuccess.confirmation: We just sent a confirmation link to your inbox. Open it to verify your account and unlock the dashboard.
signUpSuccess.tips: Check spam or promotions and add hola@quecargan.com to your safe sender list.

forgot.title: Reset Your Password
forgot.description: Type in your email and we'll send you a link to reset your password
forgot.successBody: If you registered using your email and password, you will receive a password reset email.

update.title: Reset Your Password
update.description: Please enter your new password below.

pricing.title: Pricing & Availability
pricing.subtitle: {count, plural, =0 {No sellers available} one {Available at 1 seller} other {Available at # sellers}}
pricing.sellers: {count, plural, =0 {0 sellers} one {1 seller} other {# sellers}}

financing.title: Financing Options
financing.subtitle: Explore pre-approved financing from our partner banks

share.error: We couldn't share this vehicle. Try again.

vehicleDetail.descriptionTemplate: Explore the {year} electric {brand} {model} in Costa Rica. Specifications, pricing, and availability from official dealers.

vehicleList.title: Electric Vehicles in Costa Rica | QuéCargan
vehicleList.description: Compare and find the best electric vehicle in Costa Rica. Prices, specifications, range, and official dealers.
